description: '''Hori''' refers to a genre of folk songs in [[Braj Bhasha|Braj Bhasa]] and  [[Awadhi language|Awadhi]] traditionally sung during the [[Holi]] festival, particularly in the [[Braj|Braj region]] of [[Uttar Pradesh]] in India. These songs are an integral part of the [[Holi]] festivities and contribute significantly to the celebratory atmosphere.
